typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		year as string,
		industry_code_ANZSIC as string,
		industry_name_ANZSIC as string,
		rme_size_grp as string,
		variable as string,
		value as string,
		unit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(randomamount = toString(toInteger(year) * toFloat(value))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		year as string,
		industry_code_ANZSIC as string,
		industry_name_ANZSIC as string,
		randomamount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:(concat('a', 'b') )) ~> sink1
